create: INSERT INTO auditoria (user_id, action, entity, resource_id, before_data, after_data, ip, user_agent, metadata) VALUES ($1,$2,$3,$4,$5,$6,$7,$8,$9) RETURNING *;
update: UPDATE auditoria SET user_id=$1, action=$2, entity=$3, resource_id=$4, before_data=$5, after_data=$6, ip=$7, user_agent=$8, metadata=$9 WHERE id=$10 RETURNING *;
findAll: SELECT * FROM auditoria ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT $1 OFFSET $2;
deleteById: DELETE FROM auditoria WHERE id=$1 RETURNING *;
